intro.name: Sebastian Šanda
intro.subtitle: Frontend Developer | React & Next.js | WordPress
intro.role: Web Developer specializing in modern scalable web apps
intro.description: Passionate about building performant and accessible websites that bring ideas to life. Experienced in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and CSS.

roles.code8:
Development and maintenance of web applications and internal systems using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Angular.
Working in a monorepo environment (Nx) for managing large-scale projects.
Integration of REST API and GraphQL for efficient data handling.
Development of mobile applications in React Native (Expo, Firebase, push notifications).
Performance and SEO optimization; testing with Cypress, configuration of Webpack and ESlint.
roles.mcled:
Management and development of the company’s e-commerce store.
Coding in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, implementation of new features.
Product photography and content editing for the website.
Working with CRM and logistics systems in connection with the e-shop.
roles.kristian:
Design and development of websites and microsites.
Coding in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Working with October CMS to build websites and functionalities.
Collaboration with the graphic design department on visual identity creation.

about.content:
I am a frontend developer specializing in React, Next.js, and WordPress. I enjoy working on modern websites and applications that combine clean design with functionality. With more than 7 years of development experience, I am continuously learning and exploring new technologies.
In my free time, I focus on photography, graphic design, and video production, and I also enjoy exploring game development in Roblox Studio with great enthusiasm.
